title: ****UNION SQ NEWLY RENOVATED 3BED/1BA-OFF STREET PARKING INCLUDED!
posting_body: The property has four bedrooms and no living room but can be used as a three bed with one bedroom serving as a living room.
Top floor unit with spacious & renovated kitchen with stainless steel equipment and modern bathrooms.
The bedrooms are spacious, include closets, hardwood floors.
The unit comes with the coin operated laundry in the building.
The apartment is near restaurants, shopping, and the MBTA Green Line extension at Union Square.
Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!
Bus: 69 Cambridge St @ Berkshire St (0.42 mi)
Bus: 87 Somerville Ave @ McGrath Hwy (0.06 mi)
Bus: 91 Washington St @ McGrath Hwy (0.09 mi)
Bus: 86 Washington St @ McGrath Hwy (0.09 mi)
